title: Introducing: Sun Glitters
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/sunglitters.jpg "sunglitters")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6317-introducing-sun-glitters/attachment/sunglitters) It’s not often your confronted with an artist as comfortable in his own skin as **Sun Glitters**. At first glance he’s an artist riding the well ridden ‘chill-wave’. His synths are dreamy and ethereal, with the voice samples pitch tuned to create a ghost like atmosphere. Thankfully there’s so much more to **Sun Glitters**, his production is expertly crafted to form something that has a remarkable density. The voices whisper, giggle and mutter over the wonky hip-hip infused beats, in a way that simply isn’t present in most beat music today. The result is something genuinely enchanting. _Check out his Everything Could be Fine EP bellow._ everything could be fine by Sun Glitters
